data.lyric:
[ti:Good as You]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Good as You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Good as You - Kane Brown
[00:04.39]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Brock Berryhill/Shy Carter/Taylor Phillips/Will Weatherly
[00:08.79]Composed by：Kane Brown/Brock Berryhill/Shy Carter/Taylor Phillips/Will Weatherly
[00:13.18]See the way you're taking care of your momma
[00:16.78]The way you're taking care of me
[00:20.06]The way you light up any room girl
[00:22.69]You're what this world should be
[00:25.13]Tomorrow tonight the rest of my life
[00:27.99]I wanna be the man you want me to be
[00:30.96]So starting right now girl
[00:32.91]Tell me everything you need
[00:36.08]I just wanna wake up every day here in this bed
[00:43.93]And never leave I love you left unsaid
[00:49.31]It might take a hundred lifetimes to do
[00:55.26]But baby I just wanna be good as you
[01:03.97]Girl you're more than just a surface
[01:07.03]Yeah you got that heart of gold
[01:08.61]Heart of gold
[01:09.95]So when it comes to lovin' you baby
[01:12.40]Nah it'll never get old
[01:15.07]Tomorrow tonight the rest of my life
[01:17.87]I wanna be the man you want me to be
[01:21.04]So starting right now girl
[01:22.79]Tell me everything you need
[01:26.14]I just wanna wake up every day here in this bed
[01:33.82]Never leave I love you left unsaid
[01:39.30]It might take a hundred lifetimes to do
[01:45.28]But baby I just wanna be good as you
[01:50.98]Good as you baby
[02:16.11]I just wanna wake up every day here in this bed
[02:23.53]Never leave I love you left unsaid
[02:29.19]It might take a hundred lifetimes to do
[02:35.12]But baby I just wanna be good as you
[02:40.99]I just wanna wake up every day here in this bed
[02:45.75]Day here in this bed
[02:48.60]Never leave I love you left unsaid
[02:52.39]Love you left unsaid
[02:54.14]It might take a hundred lifetimes to do
[03:00.06]But baby I just wanna be good as you
[03:06.80]Baby I just wanna be good as you
data.trans:
[ti:Good as You]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Good as You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.39]//
[00:08.78]//
[00:13.18]看到你无微不至地照顾你妈妈
[00:16.78]无微不至地照顾我
[00:20.06]你照亮了我的整个房间 女孩
[00:22.69]你是全世界最美最单纯的女孩
[00:25.13]明天 今晚 乃至我的余生
[00:27.99]我都想做你心中理想的那个我
[00:30.96]所以 从现在开始 女孩
[00:32.91]把你的一切需求告诉我
[00:36.08]我只想每天躺在这张床上醒来
[00:43.93]绝不把情话藏在心里不说出来
[00:49.31]即使穷尽一生我也不在乎
[00:55.26]但是宝贝 我想和你一样优秀
[01:03.97]女孩 你柔弱的外表下 藏着美丽的心
[01:07.03]像金子一般闪闪发光
[01:08.61]像金子一般闪闪发光
[01:09.95]所以 宝贝 我对你的爱
[01:12.40]至死不渝
[01:15.07]明天 今晚 乃至我的余生
[01:17.87]我都想做你心中理想的那个我
[01:21.04]所以 从现在开始 女孩
[01:22.79]把你的一切需求告诉我
[01:26.14]我只想每天躺在这张床上醒来
[01:33.82]绝不把情话藏在心里不说出来
[01:39.30]即使穷尽一生我也不在乎
[01:45.28]但是宝贝 我想和你一样优秀
[01:50.98]和你一样优秀 宝贝
[02:16.11]我只想每天躺在这张床上醒来
[02:23.53]绝不把情话藏在心里不说出来
[02:29.19]即使穷尽一生我也不在乎
[02:35.12]但是宝贝 我想和你一样优秀
[02:40.99]我只想每天躺在这张床上醒来
[02:45.75]躺在这张床上
[02:48.60]绝不把情话藏在心里不说出来
